trans-unit.source: Specifies the class client that proxies derive from when using SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 SOAP 時做為衍生 Proxy 來源的類別用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If you are building an XML Web service client, then a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol> must be created for the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建立 XML Web 服務用戶端，然後 proxy 類別的間接或衍生直接從<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol>必須建立 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: When the XML Web service client calls using SOAP, the proxy class must derive from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>, which derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 SOAP 呼叫 XML Web 服務用戶端時，proxy 類別必須衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>，其衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol>, in turn, derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol>又，衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol>。

trans-unit.source: To communicate with an XML Web service, create a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol> for the XML Web service you want to call.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 XML Web 服務通訊，建立 proxy 類別，衍生自的間接或直接<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol>您想要呼叫 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Instead of creating the proxy class manually, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description.
trans-unit.target: 而不是手動建立 proxy 類別，使用 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 來建立指定的 XML Web 服務的服務描述的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: When a proxy class is generated for the SOAP protocol, synchronous calls to XML Web service methods are made via the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method, whereas asynchronous calls are made using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 通訊協定產生 proxy 類別時，對同步呼叫 XML Web 服務方法會透過<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法，而非同步呼叫會使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是針對 Wsdl.exe 所產生 proxy 類別`Math`XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>, which derives from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol> class.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>，其衍生自抽象<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was generated.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是`Math`XML Web service，上述的 proxy 類別產生。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class which are specific to a particular type of XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫這個類別時，您可以引入專屬於特定類型的 XML Web 服務的方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: The methods capture the parameters and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 方法會擷取參數，並呼叫基底類別來執行工作的 XML Web 服務通訊。

trans-unit.source: If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method and the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 導入的方法是非同步的如果呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />方法和<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke(System.String,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 導入的方法是同步的如果呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke(System.String,System.Object[])" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The overridden constructor typically sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url" /> property to the URL of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫建構函式通常會設定<see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url" />屬性的 XML Web service 方法的 url。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別中 XML Web Service 方法的名稱，該類別正在叫用 (Invoke) <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 物件陣列，包含要傳遞至 XML Web Service 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the array correspond to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中值的順序會對應至衍生類別之呼叫方法中參數的順序。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call when the asynchronous invoke is complete.
trans-unit.target: 非同步叫用完成後，要呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: If <c>callback</c> is <see langword="null" />, the delegate is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>callback</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則不呼叫委派。

trans-unit.source: Extra information supplied by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端提供的額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 啟動 XML Web Service 方法的非同步引動過程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method to obtain the return values from the remote method call.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，會傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法，以便自遠端方法呼叫取得傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would not call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法直接，除非您已建立您自己的 XML Web service 的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) from a Service Description exposes the XML Web service methods as names derived from the proxy class to call the XML Web service methods synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 從服務描述 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 所產生的 proxy 類別會公開 XML Web service 方法為衍生自 proxy 類別以同步方式呼叫 XML Web 服務方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To call the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式呼叫 XML Web service 方法，兩個額外的方法加入至每個 XML Web service 方法，一個使用的 proxy 類別`Begin`的 XML Web service 方法，而另一個為名稱加上前置詞`End`加入前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method to start an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法來開始呼叫 XML Web 服務方法的非同步引動過程。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `BeginAdd`, for starting an invocation to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 XML Web service 公開 （expose） 名為 XML Web 服務方法`Add`，proxy 類別包含名為的方法`BeginAdd`，啟動在引動過程 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the code for the `BeginAdd`, a call is made to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method and the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 中的程式碼`BeginAdd`，進行呼叫以<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法，並將結果放置到預期的傳回類型為`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The `methodName` is used to find the custom attributes which may have been added to the method, such as <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: `methodName`用來尋找自訂屬性的可能已經加入至方法，例如<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> provides additional information about the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> 提供有關在衍生方法的 SOAP 通訊協定所需的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: `asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `asyncState` 傳遞至`callback`納入<xref:System.IAsyncResult>從傳回<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `asyncState` parameter can be used to pass information about the context of the asynchronous call, specified in the `callback` parameter, to the delegate that handles the result.
trans-unit.target: `asyncState`參數可以用來傳遞內容的非同步呼叫，在指定的資訊`callback`參數，以處理結果的委派。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 所產生的 proxy 類別`Math`XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> method is starting an asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 內`BeginAdd`proxy 類別的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>方法正在啟動在非同步引動過程`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是`Math`XML Web service，從中建立上述的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 要求已到達伺服器電腦，但是並未成功處理。

trans-unit.source: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: 要求對物件的目前狀態而言無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the network.
trans-unit.target: 存取往路時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically binds to an XML Web service described in the discovery document at <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url" />.
trans-unit.target: 動態繫結至 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url" /> 的探索文件中所述的 XML Web Service。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client can dynamically bind to an XML Web service other than the one referenced in the proxy class using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務用戶端可以動態地繫結至 XML Web 服務 proxy 類別使用中的參考以外<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A> property refers to the base address of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A>屬性指的是 XML Web 服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: However, before invoking the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A> property to a URL of a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 不過，再叫用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A>方法，設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A>屬性以探索文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method attempts to find a match in the discovery document to the binding defined in the proxy class and then dynamically bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A>方法會嘗試在 proxy 類別中定義的繫結的探索文件中尋找相符項目，然後動態地繫結到它。

trans-unit.source: If successful, subsequent method calls are directed to the XML Web service described in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，後續的方法呼叫會被導向至 XML Web 服務探索文件中所述。

trans-unit.source: If the proxy class is built using the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe), the proxy class defines the binding implemented by the XML Web service methods it invokes using the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 來建置 proxy 類別時，proxy 類別會定義實作 XML Web service 方法，它會叫用使用的繫結<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service implements multiple bindings, Wsdl.exe creates a proxy class for each binding.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web service 實作多個繫結時，Wsdl.exe 建立 proxy 類別，每個繫結。

trans-unit.source: Applied to each proxy class is a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute> that defines the name of the binding and its namespace.
trans-unit.target: 套用至每個 proxy 類別是<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute>所定義的繫結和它的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: The discovery document you set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A> property to must contain a reference to an XML Web service that implements the same binding name and namespace, or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 您所設定的探索文件<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol.Url%2A>屬性必須包含實作相同的繫結名稱和命名空間、 XML Web 服務的參考，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated using the Wsdl.exe utility for the `Math` XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是使用 Wsdl.exe 公用程式所產生的 proxy 類別`Math`XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute> is applied to the `Math` proxy class setting the binding name to `MathSoap` and its namespace to `http://tempuri.org/`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceBindingAttribute>套用至`Math`proxy 類別設定繫結名稱為`MathSoap`以及要其命名空間`http://tempuri.org/`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Service client using the preceding proxy class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是使用上述的 proxy 類別的 Web 服務用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EnterBtn_Click` event of the Web Form, the XML Web service client calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method attempting to dynamically bind to the URL supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 內`EnterBtn_Click`Web 表單，XML Web 服務用戶端呼叫的事件<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover%2A>嘗試動態地繫結至 URL 的使用者所提供的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class does not have a binding defined.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別不會定義繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned from the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 方法傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 結束 XML Web Service 方法的非同步引動過程。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains the return value and any by-reference or <see langword="out" /> parameters of the derived class method.
trans-unit.target: 物件陣列，包含衍生類別方法的傳回值以及任何傳址 (By Reference) 方式或 <see langword="out" /> 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would not call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法直接，除非您已建立您自己的 XML Web service 的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class for calling the XML Web service methods synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 由 XML Web service 的 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 所產生的 proxy 類別會公開 XML Web service 方法，為開 proxy 類別以同步方式呼叫 XML Web 服務方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For calling the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式呼叫 XML Web service 方法，兩個額外的方法加入至每個 XML Web service 方法，一個使用的 proxy 類別`Begin`的 XML Web service 方法，而另一個為名稱加上前置詞`End`加入前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method to complete an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法來完成 XML Web service 方法的非同步引動過程呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `EndAdd`, for completing an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 XML Web service 公開 （expose） 名為 XML Web 服務方法`Add`，proxy 類別包含名為的方法`EndAdd`，完成的非同步引動過程的 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the code for the `EndAdd` a call is made to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 中的程式碼`EndAdd`進行呼叫以<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法，然後結果會放入預期的傳回類型為`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是針對 Wsdl.exe 所產生 proxy 類別`Math`XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A> method completes the asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 內`EndAdd`proxy 類別的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke%2A>方法完成的非同步引動過程`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是`Math`XML Web service，從中建立上述的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is not the return value from the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 並非 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke(System.String,System.Object[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 要求已到達伺服器電腦，但是並未成功處理。

trans-unit.source: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: 要求對物件的目前狀態而言無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the network.
trans-unit.target: 存取往路時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> that provides the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" />，提供 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" />，以初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The initial buffer size of the <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamReader" /> used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamReader" /> 所使用之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的初始緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> initialized with the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，它是使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> 屬性初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> initialized with the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> property of the <paramref name="message" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，使用 <paramref name="message" /> 參數的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> 屬性初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to use when creating the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 時要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> for the specified <paramref name="uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定之 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 的 <paramref name="uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 所指定之 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to customize the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> before the XML Web service request is made.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫自訂<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>之前 XML Web 服務要求。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could add a custom header to the request.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您無法將自訂標頭加入要求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uri" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> that provides the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" />，提供 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" />，以初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The initial buffer size of the <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamWriter" /> used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamWriter" /> 所使用之 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 的初始緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> initialized with the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />，它是使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage" /> 屬性初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> initialized with the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> property of the <paramref name="message" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />，使用 <paramref name="message" /> 參數的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.Stream" /> 屬性初始化。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains the parameters to pass to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 物件陣列，包含要傳遞至 XML Web Service 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中值的順序會對應至衍生類別之呼叫方法中參數的順序。

trans-unit.source: Invokes an XML Web service method synchronously using SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 同步叫用 XML Web Service 方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains the return value and any <see langword="reference" /> or <see langword="out" /> parameters of the derived class method.
trans-unit.target: 物件陣列，包含衍生類別方法的傳回值和任何 <see langword="reference" /> 或 <see langword="out" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method directly, unless you are building your own proxy class for an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法直接，除非您正在建置您自己的 XML Web service 的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: 由 XML Web service 的 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 所產生的 proxy 類別會公開 XML Web service 方法，為開 proxy 類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The proxy class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method to invoke an XML Web service method call.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>叫用 XML Web 服務方法呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class also contains a method named `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 XML Web service 公開 （expose） 名為 XML Web 服務方法`Add`，proxy 類別也包含名為的方法`Add`。

trans-unit.source: Within the code for the `Add` method in the proxy class, a synchronous call is made to the XML Web service method through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 中的程式碼`Add`方法中的 proxy 類別，同步呼叫 XML Web service 方法，透過<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法，然後結果會放入預期的傳回類型為`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The `methodName` parameter is used to find the custom attributes that may have been added to the method, such as <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: `methodName`參數用來尋找自訂屬性，可能已經加入至方法，例如<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> provides additional information on the derived method which is required for the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> 在衍生方法所需的 SOAP 通訊協定提供其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是針對 Wsdl.exe 所產生 proxy 類別`Math`XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A> method is calling the `Add` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 內`Add`proxy 類別的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke%2A>方法呼叫`Add`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是`Math`XML Web service，從中建立上述的 proxy 類別。

trans-unit.source: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 要求已到達伺服器電腦，但是並未成功處理。

trans-unit.source: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: 要求對物件的目前狀態而言無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the network.
trans-unit.target: 存取往路時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 非同步叫用指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 所要叫用之方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至該方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The delegate called when the method invocation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 方法引動過程完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 非同步叫用指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 所要叫用之方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至該方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The delegate called when the method invocation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 方法引動過程完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: An object used to pass state information into the <c>callback</c> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 用來將狀態資訊傳遞至 <c>callback</c> 委派的物件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified method asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 非同步叫用指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the SOAP protocol used to make the SOAP request to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 通訊協定的版本，用於對 XML Web Service 發出 SOAP 要求。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A> property is set in the proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11> by default when a WSDL document for an XML Web service supports SOAP version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A>屬性會設定至 Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 所產生的 proxy 類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11>依預設，當 XML Web 服務的 WSDL 文件支援 SOAP 1.1 版。

trans-unit.source: However, when an XML Web service only supports SOAP 1.2, Wsdl.exe sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap12>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當 XML Web 服務只支援 SOAP 1.2，Wsdl.exe 集<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap12>。

trans-unit.source: To choose the version of the SOAP protocol when generating the proxy class with Wsdl.exe, use the `/protocol` switch with the `SOAP` or `SOAP12` settings to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap12>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生 proxy 類別，使用 Wsdl.exe 時，請選擇 SOAP 通訊協定版本，請使用`/protocol`參數搭配`SOAP`或`SOAP12`設定，以便設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap11>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Soap12>分別.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the version of the protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service to SOAP 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定用來與 SOAP 1.2 XML Web 服務通訊的通訊協定版本。
